description: Creates a new user in the user pool.

parameters.name: UserName
parameters.description: The email address of the user.

parameters.name: MessageAction
parameters.description: The action to take for the welcome email that is sent to a user after the user is created in the user pool. If you specify SUPPRESS, no email is sent. If you specify RESEND, do not specify the first name or last name of the user. If the value is null, the email is sent.

parameters.name: AuthenticationType
parameters.description: The authentication type for the user. You must specify USERPOOL.
